Google Pixel 3 comes with 5.5 inches P-OLED capacitive display and performs 2.5 GHz, Qualcomm SDM845 Snapdragon 845 Octa-Core processor. It is packed with 4 GB of RAM and 64/128 GB of internal storage capacity, which can not expand external storage. This stylish device has a 12.2 MP camera in the back and an 8 MP, 8 MP camera on the front side. It is powered by a standard battery of 2925 mAh Li-ion battery.

description: The price of Oppo K1 is 19,000. Oppo K1 brings some great features Fingerprint (under display), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass sensor. It’s a 4G tech dual-SIM smartphone. Oppo K1 is available in Blue, Red and Silver Green colors. This is a 6.4 inches, 101.0 cm2 (~84.5% screen-to-body ratio), Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors display with 1080 x 2340 pixels. The camera has a dual camera with 16 MP and 2 MP. The front has a 25 MP camera with touch focus. It is powered by 3600 mAh Li-Ion battery, which runs the Qualcomm SDM660 Snapdragon 660 (14 nm) processor and offers 4/6 GB of RAM and 64 GB of ROM.
